= Ontology Review Management =

This page was originally created to cover guidelines for managing reviews. That material is not covered in the [http://code.google.com/p/obo-foundry-operations-committee/wiki/ReviewProcessGuidelines ontology review process guidelines] and the [http://code.google.com/p/obo-foundry-operations-committee/wiki/ReviewCriteriaPolicies ontology review criteria policies].
